# Polish Academy Award for Best Director__disambig_1

}}
The Polish Academy Award for Best Film Director is an annual award given to the best Polish film director of the year.
Winners and nominees
1990s
became the first winner of this award for Nothing (1998).]]
won two awards in this category for The Debt (1999) and Saviour Square (2006). Second win was shared with his wife Joanna Kos-Krauze.]]
won for Life as a Fatal Sexually Transmitted Disease (2000).]]
won for Hi Tessa (2001).]]
